onna dan api kiyanna yanne hostal rasakatha.me dawaswala kakki katha nagala yana eke mulinma me siddiya danna hithuna.siddiya wune ape kattiya 10 wasare innakotamayi.ithin hostal ekak wunama aniwaryayenma toyilatuth thiyenna oone nowa!onna kuruduwaththa hostal ekenan ee dawaswala toyilat dekakma thibunalu.ekak siniyar hostal ekata.anika juniyar hostal ekata.ithin purupuru, malukatta athulu 10 wasare kattiya giye mulinma kiyapu siniyar toyilat ekatalu.
